No more reading through long articles to find the one information you need! Get direct responses for your queries on any website, along with the exact passage corresponding to what you're looking for.
when on a website containing tons of information along with some unneeded crap, use our add-on to get directly that information for which your were looking for. Just click our add-ons icon, that will take you to our tool's interface where your can ask for any information you were looking on that website.
